allIssues.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
allIssues.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.4 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #00b1ff, font size: 7.5pt (10px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
